schedule.title: Introduction
schedule.description: A short introduction to the trading world, followed by a fun market making game with the potential to win some cash prizes!
schedule.topics: Overview of Trading, Market Making game

schedule.title: Recruiting Process
schedule.description: Learn about the recruiting process for quant firms, how to prepare your resume, and practice behavioral interviews.
schedule.topics: Recruiting Process, Behaviorals + Resume, Beginner Poker Theory

schedule.title: Probability I
schedule.description: Introduction to fundamental probability concepts with a focus on counting and combinatorics.

schedule.title: Market making Games Social
schedule.description: A social event featuring market making games and networking opportunities.

schedule.title: Probability II
schedule.description: Advanced probability concepts including expectation, conditional probability, and Bayes' Rule.
schedule.topics: Probability II (Expectation, Conditional Probability, Bayes' Rule)

schedule.title: Alumni Speaker I
schedule.description: Hear from a Dartmouth alum working in the quantitative finance industry.

schedule.title: Pong Social
schedule.description: A casual social event to meet with other members of the club.

schedule.title: Strategy, Game theory
schedule.description: Explore strategic decision making and game theory concepts relevant to trading.

schedule.title: Alumni Speaker II
schedule.description: Final session featuring another Dartmouth alum in the quantitative finance industry.
